Question
========
Which of the following conditions must be met for a single regression analysis in which you predict the score on Y from the score on X?

Answerlist
----------
* The relationship between X and Y must be linear.
* The variable $Y$ must have been measured at least at the interval level.
* The residuals $\hat{Y}$ should be approximately normally distributed.
* All three conditions must be met.

Solution
========

All three conditions are prerequisites for regression analysis.

Answerlist
----------
* This is incorrect
* This is incorrect
* This is incorrect
* Correct!
